channel.title: [TUT] Setting Proxy For Aryan
channel.description:
This is my tutorial to add proxy to aryan.
1. Go to your aryan folder 2. Make new .bat file (example: Proxy.bat) 3. Now its time to open and modify your Proxy.bat file. 4. Just copy the code below.
[code][sub]@echo off title Running Bot java -DsocksProxyHost=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx -DsocksProxyPort=xxxx -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./OUTPUT;./OUTPUT/unrenamed.jar;./BotClasses; Bot pause[/sub][/code]
5. And now, paste it to your opened Proxy.bat 6. Now close your notepad or other text editing program where you have your proxy.bat opened, and save changes.
Before using your proxy.bat, remember to set your proxy way (Read below)! When you want to use proxy when using aryan, just double click Proxy.bat
Before you can use your proxy.bat, you need one [color=purple]SOCKS-5[/color] proxy ip and port! !Allways when you want new proxyway, modify your proxy.bat You can get your socks-5 proxy here: [url=http://www.aliveproxy.com/socks5-list/]http://www.aliveproxy.com/socks5-list/[/url] When you are finding for best proxy for you, dont care about the countrys or anything else, just look at the Average Response Time(ms).
HIGH Average Response Time(ms) = BAD LOW Average Response Time(ms) = GOOD
This is how you can change your proxyway. In Proxy.bat modify this areas:
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx = Add your proxy ip here. xxxx = Add your proxy port here.
[b]Many times asked[/b] Q. When im trying to use proxy, aryan says "Error connecting to server", what to do? A. Try to log in several times, like 5-10. If it still saying "Error connecting to server", Get new proxy.
Heres proxy.bat file for users, who cant make their own for some reason. Extract proxy.zip to your aryan folder and add your socks-5 proxy ip and port, then your done :D

item.description:
@volume000 wrote:

omg im so useless i still cant make it…
now that just goes:
and pop up didnt ask anything…

i talk a little all over… i make notepad file i put there for example:

@echo off
title Running Bot
java -DsocksProxyHost=218.135.186.121 -DsocksProxyPort=8080 -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./OUTPUT;./OUTPUT/unrenamed.jar;./BotClasses; Bot
pause

then i SAVE AS it to like run.bat, then theres come
then i load it and everything is normal and then i try logging in it says: error connecting to server…

im bothering u 2 much…? i just cant make it… :S

EDIT/ i think when it first time worked for me there came file, but its not coming anymore :S
do i need to compile anything?.. ahh i cant understand…

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] Setting Proxy For Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

[quote=“volume000, post:19, topic:2574”]i cant understand in english what that means: piilota tunnettujen tiedostotyypien tunnisteet

what i have to put there? i just dont now what it is in english

and when i have done that then i just re-name my “proxyrunbot” to “itworks.bat” ?[/quote]

Its “Hide extensions for known file types”.
Take that X away and press OK.
Now just rename it to itworksorwhatever.bat and you get pop up what says something like this: “Are you sure, that do you want to change your file type?” and your press YES.
If you have setted your proxy ip and port, just double click your .bat file

[quote=“jerre, post:16, topic:2574”]lol i dont get a window volume000 iget something else lol how u print screen[br][size=1]Posted at: May 12, 2006, 09:47:58 am[/size][hr]how u get full version of ais alive proxy server??
[br][size=1]Posted at: May 12, 2006, 09:54:00 am[/size][hr]first i just looked on site with proxy list and the proxy ip and port worked i could login then i downlaoded ais proxy server and tooked proxy ip an port and then i get error connecting with server[br][size=1]Posted at: May 12, 2006, 10:07:30 am[/size][hr]got same problem as volume ooo could u put the guide to get program fixed in english plz cuz with me its different then u thnx[/quote]

Personally, i dont have downloaded ais proxy server program. When you just go to http://www.aliveproxy.com/socks5-list/ you will see like 10 proxys! Try them first. What about guys, if you just download proxy.zip and extract it to your aryan folder? Then you just need to modify and add your proxy ip and port. So, you dont need to make .bat yourself. Thats why proxy.zip file are there Sorry about my bad english. I live in finland and we have language called finnish, so its hard to make tut with pics

pause
